title: Assessment of acid catalytic properties of ferrosilicate MFI zeolite by methanol-to-hydrocarbon conversion
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29006-29013
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05039H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hanyoung Park, Gwang-Jin Na, Jeong-Chul Kim, Ryong Ryoo
Four representative synthetic methods were employed to prepare Fe-containing siliceous MFI zeolites. The catalytic properties of these zeolites were evaluated by methanol-to-hydrocarbon reaction.
